channel.title: Satisfactory Modding Documentation
channel.description:
This will help you out to get started in modding Satisfactory. It provides information about Unreal and its internal architecture, concepts used by Satisfactory, structures/descriptions of Satisfactory Classes, guides to get started in Pak and C++ modding and reference for SML itself.
Check it out here: https://docs.ficsit.app/
